    @allure.title("Test to verify that the branching rules works as per the latest value of single select dropdown in "

    @allure.description("This test is to verify that the branching rules works as per the latest value of single select"
                        "dropdown in recurred task during execution")
    @allure.link("https://app.clickup.com/t/86cvx82tq")
    @pytest.mark.scenario
    @pytest.mark.job
    @pytest.mark.task_recurrence_execution
    @pytest.mark.test_branching_rules_as_per_latest_value_of_single_select_dropdown_in_recurred_task
    @pytest.mark.parametrize("job_execution_by, users_list", [("user", [Env.get_env_data("QA_PUBLISHER_USERNAME_01")]),
                                                              ("user_group", [])])
    def test_branching_rules_as_per_latest_value_of_single_select_dropdown_in_recurred_task(self, user_group_creation,
                                                                                            job_execution_by,
                                                                                            users_list):
        process_data = self.recurrence_obj.test_add_branching_rule_in_single_select_dropdown_parameter_to_hide_parameters_in_different_tasks_with_recurrence()
        login(Env.get_env_data("QA_PUBLISHER_USERNAME_01"), Env.get_env_data("QA_PUBLISHER_PASSWORD_01"))
        select_facility(const.FACILITY_NAME)
        select_usecase(const.USECASE_NAME)
        self.job_obj.assign_user_and_user_group_to_process(job_execution_by, users_list, user_group_creation,
                                                           all_task_assignmnet=True)
        self.job_obj.create_job()
        self.job_obj.start_job()
        self.job_obj.start_task(task_name_01, recurrence=True)
        self.job_obj.execute_parameter(task_name_01, process_data["single_dropdown_param"], data={"value": "sunday"})
        self.job_obj.complete_task(task_name_01, recurrence=True, continue_recurrence=True)
        self.job_obj.start_task(task_name_02, recurrence=True)
        if not self.job_obj.validate_if_parameter_is_hidden(task_name_02, process_data["sign_param"]):
            raise AssertionError(
                "The parameter " + process_data["sign_param"] + " is not hidden as per the branching rules defined")
        self.job_obj.execute_parameter(task_name_02, process_data["image_param"], data=None)
        self.job_obj.complete_task(task_name_02, recurrence=True, continue_recurrence=True)
    
        self.job_obj.start_task(task_name_01, recurrence=True, recurrence_start_reason="Test_recurrence")
        self.job_obj.execute_parameter(task_name_01, process_data["single_dropdown_param"], data={"value": "saturday"})
